title: Bitcoin Prediction Games
description:
Bitcoin Prediction Games are a risk-free way to improve your Bitcoin price prediction skills with real-time market scenarios. 

Predict Bitcoin price, volume, market cap, or dominance, and compete with Sara AI and other users.

✅ No real money needed – Play with WAGMI tokens.
✅ Instant rewards – Win 20 WAGMI for every correct prediction.
✅ Compete against AI – Test your skills vs. Sara AI.
✅ Live market scenarios – Predictions based on real-time Bitcoin data.
